sentences.en: "Let's get a coffee somewhere."—"I know just the place."
sentences.cn: “我们找个地方喝杯咖啡吧。”——“我知道个好地方。”

sentences.en: "Let's invite her to dinner." — "Over my dead body!"
sentences.cn: “我们请她来吃晚饭吧。”——“除非我死了！”

sentences.en: Adam let go of the reins.
sentences.cn: 亚当脱手缰绳。

sentences.en: didn't let up in their efforts.
sentences.cn: 他们没有松劲

sentences.en: Don't let on that you know me.
sentences.cn: 不要让人知道你认识我

sentences.en: Don't let yourself despair; this will only make matters worse.
sentences.cn: 不要想不开，这样只能使情况变得更糟。

sentences.en: from the things he let drop I think there was a woman in his life.
sentences.cn: 从他随口说出的话里，我听出他身边有一个女人。

sentences.en: He rang for the guard to let him out.
sentences.cn: 他按铃叫保安放他出去。

sentences.en: he's really let himself go since my mother died.
sentences.cn: 自从妈妈去世之后，他变得越来越邋遢。

sentences.en: I can’t come out tonight – my dad won’t let me.
sentences.cn: 今天晚上我不能出来，我爸爸不允许。

sentences.en: I let myself out into the street and pulled the door shut.
sentences.cn: 我出门上街并拉上了门。

sentences.en: I let the horse drop his head to crop the spring grass.
sentences.cn: 我让马低下头啃吃春天的青草。

sentences.en: I really let him have it for worrying me so much.
sentences.cn: 他老是烦我，我好好教训了他一顿。

sentences.en: If they value these data, let them pay for them.
sentences.cn: 他们要是看重这些数据，就让他们出钱买。

sentences.en: If you have had a problem with the vatman, let us know.
sentences.cn: 如果您对增值税有什么异议的话，请告诉我们。

sentences.en: let down the sails.
sentences.cn: 放下船帆

sentences.en: let him be—he knows what he wants.
sentences.cn: 随他去吧——他知道自己要做什么。

sentences.en: let out a coat.
sentences.cn: 放大一件外衣

sentences.en: Let's sit down and then you can say what's up.
sentences.cn: 咱们先坐下来，然后你把事情告诉我。

sentences.en: Now let me see, who's the man we want?
sentences.cn: 现在让我看一看，谁是我们要找的人？

sentences.en: School let out early. The play let out at 11&b{p.m.}
sentences.cn: 学校放学早。话剧&b{晚上} 11点结束

sentences.en: She gathered loose soil and let it filter slowly through her fingers.
sentences.cn: 她捧起疏松的泥土，任其缓缓地从指间漏下。

sentences.en: She unbound her hair and let it flow loose in the wind.
sentences.cn: 她把头发解开，让它随风飘动。

sentences.en: The Doberman let out a string of roaring barks.
sentences.cn: 短毛猎犬一阵狂吠。

sentences.en: The rain let up.
sentences.cn: 雨停下来了

sentences.en: The rain let up.
sentences.cn: 雨停下来了

sentences.en: the troops let fly with shells loaded with chemical weapons.
sentences.cn: 军队用化学武器炮弹进行攻击。

sentences.en: they let the hostages go.
sentences.cn: 他们放了人质。

sentences.en: Though Sybbis complained bitterly, Mama would not let up on her.
sentences.cn: 尽管西比斯大发牢骚，但妈妈不会放她一马。

sentences.en: Well, at any rate, let me thank you for all you did.
sentences.cn: 好吧，不管怎样，还是要感谢你所做的一切。

sentences.en: Who let that story out?
sentences.cn: 是谁泄露了消息?

sentences.en: you must let the past go.
sentences.cn: 你必须摆脱过去。

sentences.en: you need to unwind and let yourself go.
sentences.cn: 你该放松下来，干点自己想干的事。

phrases.tran_cn: 使失望：没有达到所期望的；使沮丧
对…进行（身体或语言）攻击
让我告诉你；老实告诉你
放出；准许…暂停工作；宽恕
放大（衣服）：增大（例如衣服的）尺寸
无意中说出，不经意透露

trans.tran_en: an arrangement in which a house or flat is rented to someone

trans.tran_cn: 允许，许可，让，要，假设，出租
trans.tran_en: to allow someone to do something

trans.tran_cn: 允许； 让； 假设； 出租
trans.tran_en: to allow someone to do something
